verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rejoice, ye pure in heart, rejoice, give thanks, and sing; your festal banner wave on high, the cross of Christ your King.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice, give thanks and sing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: With all the angel choirs, with all the saints of earth, pour out the strains of joy and bliss, true rapture, noblest mirth! [Refrain]

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Yes, on thro' life's long path, still chanting as ye go, from youth to age, by night and day, in gladness and in woe. [Refrain]

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Still lift your standard high, still march in firm array, as warriors thro' the darkness toil till dawns the golden day. [Refrain]
